name: Lion
description: Large carnivorous feline known for its mane.

name: Elephant
description: Giant herbivorous mammal with a long trunk.

name: Tiger
description: Large carnivorous feline with distinctive stripes.

name: Giraffe
description: Tall herbivorous mammal with a long neck.

name: Zebra
description: Herbivorous mammal with black and white stripes.

name: Eagle
description: Large bird of prey known for its keen eyesight.

name: Dolphin
description: Highly intelligent marine mammal known for its playful behavior.

name: Crocodile
description: Large aquatic reptile with a long snout and sharp teeth.

name: Penguin
description: Flightless aquatic bird with black and white plumage.
